Mr. Frank E. Schooley
Executive Secretary
The National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
Regarding your December 10th letter, I don’t
think the Civilian Defense Board is the agency to get such
an order through. My own opinion, is that a request should
be made to the Federal Communications Commission.
Very sincerely yours.
MSI!: sd
NEW YORK
WORLD’S FAIR 1940
'New York City's Own Station"—810 Kc.
